index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 24.72.020, 24.72.040, 24.72.070 and 24.72.160 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Ordinance 86300 as amended) to provide for review and recommendation on proposed amendments to the Zoning Ordinance text by the Director of Construction and Land Use and to eliminate the requirement of transmitting the Hearing Examiner decision on a Council Conditional Use to the Community Development Director.
